title: Method info
description: Information about methods in a task

commit.description: Git commit SHA for this version of the method

summary.description: One line summary of the method

type.description: Type of the method. Either 'control_method' (a positive or negative control used for scaling metric values), 'method' (a real method that is being benchmarked) or 'reference_method' (another method that is included in results for comparison but not used for scaling)

link_code.description: URL to the package or code provided by the method authors

link_documentation.description: URL to documentation provided by the method authors

link_implementation.description: Permalink URL to the version of the method component used

link_container_image.description: URL to the container image used by the method component

additional_info.description: Additional information from the method config

version.description: Tag for this version of the task
